mapper.select: select o_id, u_id, o_time, o_status, o_total_price, o_remark, ad_id, o_pay_type, o_freight_price, o_idEnd, o_pay_status, es_1, es_2, es_3 from orders where o_id = #{oId}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(u_id, o_time, o_status, o_total_price, o_remark, ad_id, o_pay_type, o_freight_price, o_idEnd, o_pay_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values (#{uId}, #{oTime}, #{oStatus}, #{oTotalPrice}, #{oRemark}, #{adId}, #{oPayType}, #{oFreightPrice}, #{oIdend}, #{oPayStatus}, #{es1}, #{es2}, #{es3})

insert into orders(u_id, o_time, o_status, o_total_price, o_remark, ad_id, o_pay_type, o_freight_price, o_idEnd, o_pay_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.oTime}, #{entity.oStatus}, #{entity.oTotalPrice}, #{entity.oRemark}, #{entity.adId}, #{entity.oPayType}, #{entity.oFreightPrice}, #{entity.oIdend}, #{entity.oPayStatus}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})

insert into orders(u_id, o_time, o_status, o_total_price, o_remark, ad_id, o_pay_type, o_freight_price, o_idEnd, o_pay_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.oTime}, #{entity.oStatus}, #{entity.oTotalPrice}, #{entity.oRemark}, #{entity.adId}, #{entity.oPayType}, #{entity.oFreightPrice}, #{entity.oIdend}, #{entity.oPayStatus}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})
on duplicate key update u_id = values(u_id), o_time = values(o_time), o_status = values(o_status), o_total_price = values(o_total_price), o_remark = values(o_remark), ad_id = values(ad_id), o_pay_type = values(o_pay_type), o_freight_price = values(o_freight_price), o_idEnd = values(o_idEnd), o_pay_status = values(o_pay_status), es_1 = values(es_1), es_2 = values(es_2), es_3 = values(es_3)
mapper.update:
update orders
u_id = #{uId},
o_time = #{oTime},
o_status = #{oStatus},
o_total_price = #{oTotalPrice},
o_remark = #{oRemark},
ad_id = #{adId},
o_pay_type = #{oPayType},
o_freight_price = #{oFreightPrice},
o_idEnd = #{oIdend},
o_pay_status = #{oPayStatus},
es_1 = #{es1},
es_2 = #{es2},
es_3 = #{es3},
where o_id = #{oId}
